Scene Description:
A cozy and warm Christmas Eve celebration. The scene features a decorated Christmas tree with twinkling lights, ornaments, and a star on top. Presents wrapped in colorful paper are placed beneath the tree.  A fireplace with a crackling fire adds to the warmth of the scene.  Family members gathered around, some wearing festive sweaters, are smiling and exchanging gifts.  Stockings hang from the mantelpiece. A table laden with Christmas dinner, including a roasted turkey or ham, is visible in the background.  Perhaps a gentle snowfall is visible through a window.

Banner Title:
The handwriter big text "Merry Christmas" in top center or center


Background Details:
A comfortable living room or dining room decorated with garlands, wreaths, and Christmas lights.  Soft lighting from lamps and the fireplace creates a warm and inviting ambiance. Snow falling outside adds a touch of winter magic.


Color Palette:
Dominated by traditional Christmas colors like red, green, and gold, with hints of white and silver.  The lighting is warm and inviting, emphasizing the cozy and festive atmosphere.


Composition:
The layout has a balanced mix of Christmas symbols and joyful interactions. Focus on the details of decorations, facial expressions, and the warm glow of the firelight to capture the essence of Christmas Eve traditions.
